Package studentlab

Class Car

java.lang.Object
studentlab.Car
public class Car extends Object
This class is named Car Class. It shows constructor chaining using keyword "this". In this code, the simpler constructors all call the more complex one, thereby chaining the calls 'UPWARDS' (from the default constructor to the one with the most arguments. Ensure that you implement it in this order). Compare this Car class with the Bicycle class also provided for you. This approach is often preferred for clarity and ease of code maintenance. Car() calls Car(String, boolean, double), program flow returns to Car() and exits the constructor. Car(String) calls Car(String, boolean, double), program flow returns to Car(String) and exits the constructor. Car(String, boolean) calls Car(String, boolean, double), program flow returns to Car(String, boolean) and exits the constructor. Car(String, boolean, double) just assigns the values. NOTE: The constructors in this code have System.out.println(a-message) in them, for demonstration purposes only. DO NOT PUT input / output into constructors in real production code!!!
Author:
Tanzim Ahmed Sagar

    Constructors

    Car()
    The default constructor sets variety to "car", isHybrid to false, and weight to zero.

    This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid to false, and weight to zero.

    This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid as passed, and weight to zero.
    Car(String variety, boolean isHybrid, double weight)
    This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid as passed, and weight as passed.

  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      public Car()
      The default constructor sets variety to "car", isHybrid to false, and weight to zero.

    • Car

      public Car(String variety)
      This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid to false, and weight to zero.
      Parameters:
      variety - The variety of this car.

    • Car

      public Car(String variety, boolean isHybrid)
      This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid as passed, and weight to zero.
      Parameters:
      variety - The variety of this car.
      isHybrid - If this car is hybrid use true, otherwise false.

    • Car

      public Car(String variety, boolean isHybrid, double weight)
      This constructor sets the variety as passed, isHybrid as passed, and weight as passed.
      Parameters:
      variety - The variety of this car.
      isHybrid - If this car is hybrid use true, otherwise false.
      weight - The weight of this car in kg.

    • createReport

      public String createReport()
      Returns:
      A String representation of this Car, each field is separated by a comma in the order of variety, isHybrid, weight with (kg) added to the end of the weight field value.
